casebody.data:
HILDEBRAN HERITAGE & DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION, INC., et al.
v.
The TOWN OF HILDEBRAN, et al. 134A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 16, 2017 Jason White, Attorney at Law, Amber Mueggenburg, Hickory, for Hildebran Heritage & Development Association, Inc., et al. Lawrence D. McMahon, Jr., Attorney at Law, Morganton, G. Redman Dill, Jr., Attorney at Law, for The Town of Hildebran. James B. Hogan, Attorney at Law, Morganton, for Foothills Recycling & Demolition, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of May 2017 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of May 2017. Each Party to bear it's own costs."
